title: Bachelor of Science in Human Services
description: The Bachelor of Science in Human Services (HS) degree provides you with an educational foundation to build a rewarding career helping others experiencing social and personal difficulties. You will learn the importance of self-reflection and self-awareness to understand your beliefs, values, and biases as a necessary tool when working with vulnerable populations.
careers: Case Manager, Nonprofit Volunteer Coordinator, Community Services Advisor/Coordinator
school: Department of Social Work and Human Services
